Affix.Name: The Exile
Affix.Desc: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 2 Energy for all party members (excluding the wearer) every 2s for 6s. This effect cannot stack.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Exile's Goblet
EQUIP_RING.Desc: A dull goblet made of a heavy metal. It was once inlaid with gemstones, but they have since been stripped off.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Exile's Feather
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: Not an actual accessory per se. Just a random bird feather that was found somewhere in the wilderness by the exile.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Exile's Circlet
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: A prestigious circlet. However, the royal insignia has been scratched out, and it is no longer the symbol of distinguished status that it once was.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Exile's Flower
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A withered flower worn on the shirt. Its former owner insisted on wearing it even in exile, so it must mean something.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Exile's Pocket Watch
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: Even after the crystal watch face was shattered and the hands lost, its former owner kept it until the end.
